data.name: Description
data.value: DevOpsAssistant provides tools for viewing and updating Azure DevOps work items. Use the navigation menu to access the following features:

data.name: Epics
data.value: Epics & Features — visualize hierarchy and maintain parent states

data.name: Validation
data.value: Story Validation — check items against configurable rules

data.name: ReleaseNotes
data.value: Release Notes — generate a summary prompt for completed stories

data.name: BulkTag
data.value: Bulk Tag — apply existing tags to multiple stories

data.name: Quality
data.value: Story Quality — review stories for INVEST compliance

data.name: Metrics
data.value: Metrics — analyze throughput and cycle time
